sense.name: clarify or state something in detail
sense.examples: The peace treaty clearly specifies the terms for the withdrawal of troops. He said we should meet but didn't specify a time. Could you please specify your criticism of my paper? The rules specify that pets cannot be kept here. The newspaper report did not specify how the men were killed. My contract specifies that I must give a month's notice if I leave my job.

sense.name: cause or bring about
sense.examples: This gene specifies the synthesis of a single protein. The equations specify the processes used in the metric setting.
